Header: SLFP MPs who went to the Galle Face Rally will not be reprimanded, Minister SB says, The need is to unite the party
Content: Minister S. B. Dissanayake has stated that action will not be taken to reprimand members of the  SLFP who chose to participate in the Joint Opposition’s Rally held at the Colombo Galle Face grounds. Responding to a query from our news team,  the Minister went on to say that the need of the hour was to keep the party united.
